plot: A film that shines a spotlight on what actors can go through in Hollywood, following a young actor as he discovers what's most important when pursuing ones dreams.
title: Running Up That Hill
plot_es: A film that shines a spotlight on what actors can go through in Hollywood, following a young actor as he discovers what's most important when pursuing ones dreams.
plot_en: A film that shines a spotlight on what actors can go through in Hollywood, following a young actor as he discovers what's most important when pursuing ones dreams.
